name: Avnas
skill: Deals 4786/5866 DMG to 1 random enemy, with a very high chance of inflicting Silence.
ability: All melee foes take moderately more DMG at the start of each wave.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a demon with powers of deception, betrayal and general evil. Her mouth is her greatest weapon. She spreads seeds of doubt in the minds of her foes, causing them to spiral into deep paranoia. Then it's only a matter of time until they're finished. Rumors say that back when she was an angel she sought to peacefully resolve any and all disagreements... though, really, you shouldn't listen to rumors.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 22/03/17- 12/04/17
◦ Trade at Exchange for 50 Mochi 09/04/17 - 12/04/17
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Increases the total Event Points by 33% during the "Chopping Trees? Stop, Please!" event.
◦ The effect increases with the number of limit breaks. (33% → 49.75% → 66.5% → 83.25% → 100%)
◦ Summon rate increased until 22/03/17- 12/04/17

main: "Spread some rumors, ruin some lives... What better way to keep the peace?"
summon: "I am a messenger of peace! ...A demonic one, sure, but what's the big deal?"
